Sql.query: select * from trn_barra where barrcodi = :barrcodi

insert into trn_barra ( barrcodi, barrnombre, barrtension, barrpuntosuministrorer, barrbarrabgr, barrestado, barrflagbarratransferencia, areacodi, barrbarratransferencia, barrflagdesbalance, barrusername, barrfecins,barrfactorperdida, osinergcodi ) values ( :barrcodi, :barrnombre, :barrtension, :barrpuntosuministrorer, :barrbarrabgr, :barrestado, :barrflagbarratransferencia, :areacodi, :barrbarratransferencia, :barrflagdesbalance, :barrusername, :barrfecins,:barrfactorperdida, :osinergcodi )

update trn_barra set barrnombre = :barrnombre, barrtension = :barrtension, barrpuntosuministrorer = :barrpuntosuministrorer, barrbarrabgr = :barrbarrabgr, barrestado = :barrestado, barrflagbarratransferencia= :barrflagbarratransferencia, areacodi=:areacodi, barrbarratransferencia= :barrbarratransferencia, barrflagdesbalance = :barrflagdesbalance, barrfecact = :barrfecact, barrfactorperdida = :barrfactorperdida, osinergcodi = :osinergcodi where barrcodi = :barrcodi
delete from trn_barra where barrcodi = :barrcodi
update aud_trn_barra set USERAUDITORIA = :barrusername where barrcodi = :barrcodi and ACTIONAUDITORIA = 'DELETE'
select * from trn_barra order by barrnombre asc
select b.*, a.areanomb from trn_barra b left join vw_eq_area a on b.areacodi = a.areacodi order by b.barrnombre asc
select * from trn_barra where barrflagbarratransferencia = 'SI' and barrestado = 'ACT' order by barrbarratransferencia asc
select * from trn_barra where barrflagbarratransferencia = 'NO' and barrestado = 'ACT' order by barrbarratransferencia asc
select * from trn_barra where barrestado = 'ACT' order by barrbarratransferencia asc
select * from trn_barra Where barrbarrabgr = 'SI' order by barrbarratransferencia asc
select * from trn_barra where (barrnombre like '%{0}%' or '-1' = '{0}') and (barrcodi in ({1}) or '-1' = '{1}') order by barrnombre asc
select nvl(max(barrcodi), 0) + 1 from trn_barra
select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_codigo_entrega) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc
select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_codigo_infobase) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc
select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc

select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud where genemprcodi=:genemprcodi and cliemprcodi=:cliemprcodi ) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc

SELECT DISTINCT BAR.* FROM trn_trans_retiro RET INNER JOIN TRN_PERIODO PER ON RET.PERICODI=PER.PERICODI INNER JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMPR ON RET.CLIEMPRCODI=EMPR.EMPRCODI INNER JOIN TRN_CODIGO_RETIRO_SOLICITUD SOL ON RET.TRETCODIGO=SOL.CORESOCODIGO INNER JOIN TRN_BARRA BAR ON RET.BARRCODI=BAR.BARRCODI WHERE (RET.GENEMPRCODI =:genemprcodi AND RET.CLIEMPRCODI=:cliemprcodi)
SELECT DISTINCT BAR.* FROM trn_trans_entrega TRT INNER JOIN TRN_BARRA BAR ON TRT.BARRCODI=BAR.BARRCODI WHERE (TRT.EMPRCODI=:genemprcodi )
SELECT DISTINCT BAR.* FROM trn_valor_trans VTR INNER JOIN TRN_BARRA BAR ON VTR.BARRCODI=BAR.BARRCODI WHERE VTRANFLAG=:flag AND VTR.EMPRCODI=:genemprcodi AND PERICODI=:pericodi

select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select sdt.barrcodisum from trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud rsl inner join vtp_codigo_retiro_sol_det sdt on rsl.coresocodi=sdt.coresocodi where genemprcodi=:genemprcodi and cliemprcodi=:cliemprcodi ) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc

SELECT DISTINCT BAR.* FROM trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud SOL INNER JOIN vtp_codigo_retiro_sol_det SOLDET ON SOL.coresocodi=SOLDET.coresocodi INNER JOIN TRN_BARRA BAR ON BAR.BARRCODI=SOL.BARRCODI OR BAR.BARRCODI=SOLDET.BARRCODISUM where genemprcodi=:genemprcodi and cliemprcodi=:cliemprcodi
SELECT * FROM TRN_BARRA WHERE BARRCODI IN(SELECT BARRCODISUM FROM VTP_CODIGO_RETIRO_SOL_DET WHERE (BARRCODITRA=:barrcoditra OR :barrcoditra is null))
SELECT * FROM VTP_BARRA_RELACION VBR INNER JOIN TRN_BARRA TNB ON VBR.BARRCODISUM=TNB.BARRCODI WHERE BARRCODITRA=:barrcoditra AND bareestado='ACT'
select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_codigo_retiro_sincontrato) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc
select * from trn_barra where barrcodi in (select barrcodi from trn_valor_trans) order by barrbarratransferencia, barrnombre asc
select * from trn_barra where trim(barrnombre) = trim(:barrnombre)
select barra as barrcodi, nombre as barrbarratransferencia from dtr_barratrans order by 2 asc
select barra as barrcodi, nombre as barrbarratransferencia from dtr_barratrans where barra = :barracodi
SELECT BARRCODI,BARRBARRATRANSFERENCIA FROM TRN_BARRA WHERE BARRFLAGBARRACOMPENSA='SI' ORDER BY 2

select a.*, b.areanomb from TRN_BARRA a inner join eq_area b ON b.areacodi = a.areacodi where (a.barrcodi IN ({0}) OR '{0}' = '-1') and a.barrestado = 'ACT' and a.barrflagbarratransferencia = 'SI' and a.barrtension is not null

select distinct se.emprcodi, se.emprnomb,gr.grupocodi, gr.gruponomb, gr.grupopadre, ba.barrcodi , ba.barrnombre from trn_codigo_entrega CE inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equipadre = ce.equicodi or eq.equicodi = ce.equicodi inner join pr_grupo gr on eq.grupocodi= gr.grupocodi inner join si_empresa se on se.emprcodi=gr.emprcodi inner join trn_barra ba on ba.barrcodi = ce.barrcodi where (eq.famcodi = 2 OR eq.famcodi = 3 OR eq.famcodi = 36 OR eq.famcodi = 38) and codentestado='ACT' and ba.barrcodi <>76 and gr.grupocodi>0 order by se.emprnomb,gr.grupocodi

select distinct se.emprnomb, se.emprcodi, gr.gruponomb,gr.grupocodi, ba.barrcodi,ba.barrnombre, CM.equicodi from trn_barra ba inner join ( select distinct barrcodi,equicodi from trn_codigo_entrega where codentestado='ACT' and barrcodi <> 76 order by 1 ) CM on ba.barrcodi = CM.barrcodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equipadre = CM.equicodi AND eq.equiestado='A' AND eq.famcodi in (2, 3, 36, 38) inner join pr_grupo gr on eq.grupocodi = gr.grupocodi inner join si_empresa se on se.emprcodi = gr.emprcodi where gr.grupocodi > 0 order by 1,3,5

select a.osinergcodi, a.barrcodi, a.barrnombre, a.barrtension, b.areacodi, b.areanomb from TRN_BARRA a inner join eq_area b ON b.areacodi = a.areacodi where (a.osinergcodi='{0}' OR '{0}'='-1') and a.barrestado = 'ACT' and a.barrflagbarratransferencia = 'SI' and a.barrtension is not null

select distinct tab1.barrcodi, tab2.barrbarratransferencia, '[' || tab1.barrcodi || '] ' || tab2.barrbarratransferencia || CASE WHEN tab2.barrestado = 'INA' THEN ' [' || 'B' || ']' ELSE '' END AS barrnombreconcatenado from cpa_central tab1 join trn_barra tab2 on tab1.barrcodi = tab2.barrcodi where tab1.cparcodi = {0} order by tab2.barrbarratransferencia asc

select barrcodi, '[' || barrcodi || '] ' || barrbarratransferencia || CASE WHEN barrestado = 'INA' THEN ' [' || 'B' || ']' ELSE '' END AS barrnombreconcatenado from trn_barra where barrflagbarratransferencia = 'SI' and barrestado = 'ACT' order by barrbarratransferencia asc
